text: Wing is a small town in Burleigh County, North Dakota, United States. It is part of the Bismarck, ND Metropolitan Statistical Area. In 2020, the population of Wing was 132. The town has a post office, a gas station with service, a bar, a restaurant, a small apartment complex, an assisted living home, a hotel, several churches, and a complete public school system. == History == Wing was founded in 1911. It was named after Charles K. Wing. He was the one who platted the city's area. == Geography == Wing is at the coordinates of (47.140938, -100.280626). The city is of land. == References == Category:Cities in North Dakota
title: Wing, North Dakota
